    • Method Detail

      • hasCss

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext> HasCssValueMatcher<T> hasCss​(java.lang.String cssProperty,
                                                                                         org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String> value)
        Creates an instance of HasCssValueMatcher that checks some css property of an instance of SearchContext. It should be WebElement or some implementor of HasCssValue or WrapsElement. Otherwise the matching returns false
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a value to be matched. It should extend WebElement or it should extend both SearchContext and HasCssValue.
        Parameters:
        cssProperty - to be checked
        value - criteria to check the css property
        Returns:
        instance of HasCssValueMatcher

      • hasCss

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext> HasCssValueMatcher<T> hasCss​(java.lang.String cssProperty,
                                                                                         java.lang.String value)
        Creates an instance of HasCssValueMatcher that checks some css property of an instance of SearchContext. It should be WebElement or some implementor of HasCssValue or WrapsElement. Otherwise the matching returns false. It is expected that value of the css property is equal to the defined value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a value to be matched. It should extend WebElement or it should extend both SearchContext and HasCssValue.
        Parameters:
        cssProperty - to be checked
        value - is expected to be equal to value of the css property.
        Returns:
        instance of HasCssValueMatcher

      • hasCss

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext> HasCssValueMatcher<T> hasCss​(java.lang.String cssProperty)
        Creates an instance of HasCssValueMatcher that checks some css property of an instance of SearchContext. It should be WebElement or some implementor of HasCssValue or WrapsElement. Otherwise the matching returns false. It is expected that value of the css property is not null or empty value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a value to be matched. It should extend WebElement or it should extend both SearchContext and HasCssValue.
        Parameters:
        cssProperty - to be checked
        Returns:
        instance of HasCssValueMatcher

      • matchesSafely

        protected boolean matchesSafely​(T item,
                                org.hamcrest.Description mismatchDescription)
        Description copied from class: TypeSafeDiagnosingMatcher
        Subclasses should implement this. The item will already have been checked for the specific type and will never be null.
        Specified by:
        matchesSafely in class TypeSafeDiagnosingMatcher<T extends org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext>
        Parameters:
        item - is an object that should meet the criteria
        mismatchDescription - is an appendable object to add description of mismatch
        Returns:
        true is value to check meets the criteria. false is returned otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Specified by:
        toString in class TypeSafeDiagnosingMatcher<T extends org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext>
